pitrou commented on a change in pull request #10940:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10940#discussion_r689743070



##########
File path: ci/scripts/python_wheel_manylinux_build.sh
##########
@@ -71,6 +71,10 @@ echo "=== (${PYTHON_VERSION}) Building Arrow C++ libraries ==="
 : ${VCPKG_FEATURE_FLAGS:=-manifests}
 : ${VCPKG_TARGET_TRIPLET:=${VCPKG_DEFAULT_TRIPLET:-x64-linux-static-${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}}}
 
+if [[ "$(uname -m)" == arm* ]] || [[ "$(uname -m)" == aarch* ]]; then
+    export ARROW_EXTRA_CMAKE_FLAGS="-DARROW_JEMALLOC_LG_PAGE=14"

Review comment:
       Can you add a comment explaining why this is necessary?




--

cyb70289 commented on a change in pull request #10940:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10940#discussion_r689989015



##########
File path: ci/scripts/python_wheel_manylinux_build.sh
##########
@@ -71,6 +71,10 @@ echo "=== (${PYTHON_VERSION}) Building Arrow C++ libraries ==="
 : ${VCPKG_FEATURE_FLAGS:=-manifests}
 : ${VCPKG_TARGET_TRIPLET:=${VCPKG_DEFAULT_TRIPLET:-x64-linux-static-${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}}}
 
+if [[ "$(uname -m)" == arm* ]] || [[ "$(uname -m)" == aarch* ]]; then
+    export ARROW_EXTRA_CMAKE_FLAGS="-DARROW_JEMALLOC_LG_PAGE=14"

Review comment:
       Should it be 12 (4K)? Or 16 (64K)?




-- 
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

To unsubscribe, e-mail: github-unsubscribe@arrow.apache.org

cyb70289 commented on a change in pull request #10940:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10940#discussion_r690031243



##########
File path: ci/scripts/python_wheel_manylinux_build.sh
##########
@@ -71,6 +71,10 @@ echo "=== (${PYTHON_VERSION}) Building Arrow C++ libraries ==="
 : ${VCPKG_FEATURE_FLAGS:=-manifests}
 : ${VCPKG_TARGET_TRIPLET:=${VCPKG_DEFAULT_TRIPLET:-x64-linux-static-${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}}}
 
+if [[ "$(uname -m)" == arm* ]] || [[ "$(uname -m)" == aarch* ]]; then
+    export ARROW_EXTRA_CMAKE_FLAGS="-DARROW_JEMALLOC_LG_PAGE=14"

Review comment:
       `--with-lg-page=16` fixes issue on 64k page system. https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/10929#issuecomment-899950190
   
   I tested on 4k page system with the image built from this pr `--with-lg-page=14`, it work okay.
   
   According to https://github.com/jemalloc/jemalloc/issues/467#issuecomment-294383178, looks we can set `--with-lg-page=16` and the binary should work on both 4k and 64k page arm64 system.




-- 
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.

+if [[ "$(uname -m)" == arm* ]] || [[ "$(uname -m)" == aarch* ]]; then
+    export ARROW_EXTRA_CMAKE_FLAGS="-DARROW_JEMALLOC_LG_PAGE=14"

Review comment:
       Updated to `16`, though the conda-forge recipe uses `14`.

cyb70289 commented on a change in pull request #10940:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10940#discussion_r690376123



##########
File path: ci/scripts/python_wheel_manylinux_build.sh
##########
@@ -71,6 +71,10 @@ echo "=== (${PYTHON_VERSION}) Building Arrow C++ libraries ==="
 : ${VCPKG_FEATURE_FLAGS:=-manifests}
 : ${VCPKG_TARGET_TRIPLET:=${VCPKG_DEFAULT_TRIPLET:-x64-linux-static-${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}}}
 
+if [[ "$(uname -m)" == arm* ]] || [[ "$(uname -m)" == aarch* ]]; then
+    export ARROW_EXTRA_CMAKE_FLAGS="-DARROW_JEMALLOC_LG_PAGE=14"

Review comment:
       Arm64 does support 4k/16k/64k page sizes. 16k is rarely used and looks deprecated AFAIK.




--
